mapper.select: SELECT CP.POSTSN, C.CHANNELTITLE CHANNELTITLE, C.CHANNELCOMMENT CHANNELTEXT , U.NICK, CP.VIEWCNT, CP.LIKECNT, C.CREATEDATETIME, C.UPDATEDATETIME FROM CHANNEL C, CHANNELPOST CP , USERDATA U WHERE C.CHANNELSN = CP.CHANNELSN AND CP.USERSN = U.USERSN

SELECT CP.POSTSN, C.CHANNELTITLE CHANNELTITLE, C.CHANNELCOMMENT CHANNELTEXT , CP.TITLE POSTTITLE, CPC.POSTCONTENT, U.NICK, CP.VIEWCNT, CP.LIKECNT, C.CREATEDATETIME, C.UPDATEDATETIME FROM CHANNEL C, CHANNELPOST CP , USERDATA U , CHANNELPOSTCONTENT CPC WHERE C.CHANNELSN = CP.CHANNELSN AND CP.USERSN = U.USERSN AND CP.POSTSN = CPC.POSTSN AND CP.POSTSN =#{postSN}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHANNELPOST WHERE POSTSN = #{postSN}
